Today, Gower is looking solid with 6 ft @8s WSW swell and fresh 16 mph SW winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your best bets, with prime tides from 10:08 to 17:10 and 09:02 to 17:10 respectively. Tomorrow, conditions drop to poor with 6 ft @11s WSW and fresh 22 mph SSW winds, making it a day to skip. Day after brings back the fun with 6 ft @9s WSW and moderate 12 mph W winds, ideal for a surf session at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: today.
